meanings.definition: The act of bowling in the sport of kegling.
meanings.sent1: During the kegling tournament, everyone tried to knock down all the pins.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys kegling with her friends every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The kegling alley was filled with laughter and cheers as each player took their turn.
meanings.sent4: His precision in kegling was like a skilled archer hitting the bullseye every time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of kegling balls rolling down the lane echoed through the bowling alley.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in kegling.
meanings.sent1: The kegling champion received a shiny trophy for his skills.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated kegling enthusiast who practices regularly.
meanings.sent3: The young kegling player showed great potential during the competition.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the fastest kegling player in the league.
meanings.sent5: The group of keglings cheered for each other during the friendly match.

meanings.definition: The equipment used in kegling, such as bowling balls and pins.
meanings.sent1: The kegling alley had a variety of colorful bowling balls to choose from.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new set of kegling pins to practice at home.
meanings.sent3: The kegling equipment was neatly organized in the storage room.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the kegling ball felt just right in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The shiny surface of the kegling pins reflected the bright lights of the alley.
